name: NRS Kayak Split Stern Flotation Bags
description:
These long and narrow float bags are sized to slide easily into the stern on either side of your kayak’s centre support pillar.Made of 10-gauge urethane fabric that won't leak or delaminate.To ensure floodable spaces are completely filled, measure your boat’s compartments and use a bag that is slightly larger.Inflated dimensions are 85 x 33 (top) x 7.6cm (bottom) or 33½ x 13 x 3in.Sold in pairs.

        Sustainability






.cls-1,.cls-3{fill:none;}.cls-2{clip-path:url(#clip-path);}.cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:2.28px;}.cls-4{fill:#333;}
